Step 3: Add Lines for Sketch Face 1 1. Add a line from point [0.0, 0.0] to point [0.4914, 0.0]. 2. Add a line from point [0.4914, 0.0] to point [0.4914, 0.75]. 3. Add a line from point [0.4707, 0.7293] to point [0.0207, 0.7293]. 4. Add a line from point [0.0207, 0.7293] to point [0.0207, 0.0207]. Step 5: Scale the Sketch Scale the entire sketch by a factor of 0.75. Step 6: Transform the Sketch to 3D Perform a 3D transformation of the scaled 2D sketch using the coordinate system created in the first step. Step 7: Extrude the Sketch Extrude Face 1 by a distance of 0.0207 towards the normal, and extrude Face 2 in the opposite direction by a distance of 0.0207 to complete the part. Final Part Details - Shape: Rectangular prism with two parallel sides, flat top and bottom, and a straight line connecting the sides. - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.0207 - Height: 0.75</description>
